content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences but here's how you can book a guided tour of Kharkov's main landmarks:

1. Research tour companies that offer guided tours of Kharkov. Some popular options include Kharkiv Private Tours, Kharkiv Guide, and Kharkiv Walking Tours.

2. Visit the website of the tour company you are interested in and browse through their available tours. Look for tours that specifically focus on Kharkov's main landmarks.

3. Choose a tour that fits your schedule and interests. Be sure to check the duration, meeting point, and inclusions.

4. Book your tour online or contact the tour company directly to make a reservation. Provide the date and number of people in your group.

5. Pay for your tour in advance or check the payment options provided by the tour company.

6. On the day of your tour, meet your guide at the designated meeting point and enjoy your guided tour of Kharkov's main landmarks.
